1.0.1.en: used the standard thermostat_mode from Homey

1.0.2.en: fixed bugs, added eco mode and freeze protection mode

1.0.3.en: added debug_level device setting; changing to use of cross-fetch instead of the fetch which is part default node cleaning up imports

1.0.4.en: using midea-msmarthome-ac-euosk105@1.1.4 with more logging and errorhandling

1.0.5.en: triggercards, conditioncards and actioncards for all capabilities

1.0.6.en: Dutch translation and fixing spelling errors

1.0.9.en: Thermostat mode DRY and FAN supported

1.0.10.en: Triggers, conditions and actions created for thermostat mode

1.0.11.en: Removed the continue button during adding of device to ensure adding without authorising is not possible

1.0.13.en: Logging in into the cloud is not necessary anymore if token and key are known. It remains possible by leaving the field token and key and empty and press continue to enter the login screen. this should not only speed up the inner working, but hopefully gets rid of the timeout during pairing.

1.0.14.en: Because of the shutdown of MSmartHome's token API service, NetHome Plus is used for token and key retrievakl. A NetHome PLus account is not specifically necessary; it is possibkle to use a default account and password instead. These are pre filled in.

1.0.15.en: Better error handling; offline devices now show unavailable

1.0.16.en: No crash when timeout occurs during status update.

1.0.17.en: Added maximum number of errors occured before device is set to offline. This is set to 5 by default. This can be changed in the settings of the device.

1.0.18.en: Device becomes unavailble instead of crashing when errors occur multiple times
